description: Retrieve weather information for Taiwan using multiple Central Weather Administration (CWA) APIs. If no parameters are specified, the default query location is 臺南市.

apis.GetWeather36h: 36-hour weather forecast (今明 36 小時天氣預報)
apis.GetWeatherWeekly: 7-day city-level weather forecast (一週天氣預報)
apis.GetTownWeather: 7-day town-level weather forecast (鄉鎮天氣預報)
apis.GetStationWeatherNow: Real-time weather observation from a station (即時氣象站觀測)
apis.GetRainfallNow: Real-time rainfall observation (即時雨量觀測)
apis.GetUVIndex: Real-time UV index (即時紫外線指數)

GetWeather36h.locationName: City or county name. Default: 臺南市

GetWeatherWeekly.locationName: City or county name. Default: 臺南市

GetTownWeather.locationName: City or county name. Default: 臺南市
GetTownWeather.townName: Town or district name. Default: 中西區

GetStationWeatherNow.stationId: Weather station ID. Default: 467410 (臺南測站)

GetRainfallNow.stationId: Rainfall station ID. Default: 467410 (臺南測站)

GetUVIndex.locationName: City or county name. Default: 臺南市

GetHeavyRainAlert.locationName: City or county name. Default: 臺南市

GetColdAlert.locationName: City or county name. Default: 臺南市

GetTyphoonAlert.locationName: City or county name. Default: 臺南市

input.apiName: String. The API to call, e.g., GetWeather36h.
input.params: Optional object. Key-value pairs of query parameters for the chosen API.

output.result: Object. The JSON data returned by the API.
output.error: String. Returned if an error occurs.
